Brave, uptight, and somewhat wimpy, you are Antoine the Coyote. Having been recently promoted to captain of the Acorn Royal Guard, your first action of office was to take a well-needed vacation to Sunset Hill. After just arriving back in Mobius, it’s time to settle back into your beloved job.

“Monsieur Elias, is ‘zis really necessary? Our family tradition has been that each leader of the guard has to ‘Expel his loyal seed unto the preceding ruler of Acorn.’ I understand your hesitation at impaling royalty, but this is an order, and you are under oath to follow it. You have exactly one week from today to fuck me, or you will forfeit your promotion. Do I make myself clear?” “Crystal clear, my king…”

But Bunnie should still know what Elias wants me to do. It wouldn’t be right to just do it behind her back like that. Curses! I just don’t know what to do! …Perhaps a little ‘me time’ would help me relax a bit. All I need to do is tell the guard not to disturb me under any circumstances again.”

info.brief_description: Members of Mobius Getting it On!
info.description:
This is an interactive story dealing with the various characters in the Mobius universe. For those of you who don't know, Mobius = Sonic.

Now that most of the "Pick your start" stuff is done, members may now freely add chapters as they please. The rules for adding a chapter are as follows:

-No Death (No one can be: Stabbed, Shot, or digested in any way possible. Things such as soft chewing, bleeding from the nose/vagina (Too Big + Too Small = Pain), and any pain on a minimal level. *Bruises, bumps, slaps, whips, SMALL cuts = Okay. Slashes, bullet holes, burning skin, = No-No.
-Must be AT LEAST twenty words. Anything I post is not subjectable to this rule.
-The listed kinds of vore are allowed: Soft, Cock, Unbirth, and Anal. No hard vore, or any disturbing kind of vore not listed.
-Micro-Macro is allowed on one condition- A chapter must describe how the character got Macro/Micro. People do not start out giant/small.
-Tentacles are a yes. Impregnation by tentecles, also a yes. Tentecle strangling, NO.
-The Mobians may change gender, but must be effected by something: Radiation, technology, magic, etc. No Mobian starts out as a herm exept: Chaos, Metal Sonic, and Chao characters.
-DO NOT CHANGE FROM CHARACTER TO CHARACTER! PICK ONE AND STICK WITH IT.
-Absolutely, Positively, 100%, no Scat.

IMPORTANT IMPORTANT IMPORTANT
Remember this is a story. Not every character out there is going to whore themselves to the protagonist. Please attempt to create a scenario that "Sets the mood". Sappy junk that takes up two pages isn't needed, but I am asking you to try.

What's Going To Be Inside:

-General Sex
-Masturbation
-(Possible Vore)
-Rape
-(Possible Incest) -THERE WILL BE INCEST-
-Hyper
-Magic

Don't like any of these things? Click the back button, no one's forcing you to read it.
